name: Flash Gestures
tagline: Use your favorite mouse gesture add-on and Firefox hotkeys on plugins like Flash Player
body:
A firefox add-on that resolves the mouse gestures/hotkeys usability problem when plugins (like Adobe Flash Player) gain focus.

### Install
Flash Gestures is a bootstrapped (no restart) Firefox add-on. Download the add-on file FlashGestures-1.0b-unified.xpi and open with Firefox to install it. 

### Authors and Contributors

You can also clone via [git](http://git-scm.com/) using the following command line:
```bash
git clone https://github.com/patwonder/FlashGestures.git
```
